fragment.description: The fragment identifier of the URI, if any

host.description: The hostname of the URI, if any

port.description: The port part of the URI, if any

path.description: The path part of the URI, if any

query.description: The query part of the URI, if any

raw.description: The raw URI as a string

scheme.description: The scheme part of the URI, if any

userinfo.description: The userinfo part of the URI, if any
